attributes.action: Allow Any Proposal For A Petition However Ludicrious
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of petitions are rejected for reasons such as humour.If someone wants to petition about wearing odd socks on a Wednesday or whatever we feel it should be their democratic right.We feel that in a supposedly free society everyone should have their opinions heard. Let people post petitions here whatever the reasons, excepting incitement to hatred,racism ect.Politics used to be fun but certain people do not want to laugh anymore.The funny ones are not going to harm anybody and may just make life a bit more bareable.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
